Blacksmith Vincenz:
Lately, customers have become very interested in item augmenting. I have a lot of experience with the process, so you don't have to worry about the product's quality.
You need Life Stones to augment, but Life Stones can no longer be found. However, a new more powerful type of stone was found. It's called the Spirit Stone.
Of course, you can continue augmenting with the Life Stones that you have left. I can also exchange them for Spirit Stones if you want.
